name: Hentai Nazi: Battle of Japan
description:
Hentai Nazi: Battle of Japan - this is a continuation of the popular franchise Hentai Nazi, now you have to recapture Japan, this time, it will be more dangerous and ... funnier. A sweet and pleasant atmosphere, funny Easter eggs, and much more, awaits you, my dear lover of our anime carotians :)

Hentai Nazi: Battle of Japan - this is a third person shooter where you play as a girl, kill opponents and complete tasks. There are posters in the locations that you must tear down, the Nazis will interfere with you, you need to kill them.

  • At the moment, the game already has:
  • It is possible to collect legendary posters.
  • Aggressive enemies.
  • A cool katana that can not only kill, but also repel enemy shots, cool, isn't it?


You need to kill enemies, collect posters on various buildings.
